Further resources

Forums

Below is a list of forums (mailing lists and/or online forums) where you can ask your questions that are not specific to the aroma framework.

Bioconductor: bioc and bioc-devel

URL: http://www.bioconductor.org/

Affymetrix: Affymetrix Scientific Community Forums

URL: https://www.affymetrix.com/community/forums/index.jspa

dChip: Microarray Data Analysis Forums - Microarray data analysis using dChip and ComBat

URL: http://groups.google.com/group/dchip-software
URL2: http://dchip.forum5.com/

Scientists for Reproducible Research

URL: https://groups.google.com/group/reproducible-research

Other software tools

  • Tools for processing Affymetrix data

File formats

  • Affymetrix Data Files, Affymetrix Developers Network.
